cards.description:
+1 Action
Discard any number of cards.+1 Card per card discarded.
cards.name: Cellar

cards.description: Trash up to 4 cards from your hand.
cards.name: Chapel

cards.description:
+2 Cards
When another player plays an Attack card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, you are unaffected by that Attack.
cards.name: Moat

cards.description:
+$2
You may immediately put your deck into your discard pile.
cards.name: Chancellor

cards.description: +1 Card; +2 Actions.
cards.name: Village

cards.description: Gain a card costing up to $4.
cards.name: Workshop

cards.description: Gain a silver card; put it on top of your deck. Each other player reveals a Victory card from his hand and puts it on his deck (or reveals a hand with no Victory cards).
cards.name: Bureaucrat

cards.description: Trash this card. Gain a card costing up to $5.
cards.name: Feast

cards.description: Worth 1 Victory for every 10 cards in your deck (rounded down).
cards.name: Gardens

cards.description:
+$2
Each other player discards down to 3 cards in his hand.
cards.name: Militia

cards.description: Trash a Copper from your hand. If you do, +$3.
cards.name: Moneylender

cards.description: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to $2 more than the trashed card.
cards.name: Remodel

cards.description: +3 Cards.
cards.name: Smithy

cards.description:
+1 Card; +1 Action
Each player (including you) reveals the top card of his deck and either discards it or puts it back, your choice.
cards.name: Spy

cards.description: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck. If they revealed any Treasure cards, they trash one of them that you choose. You may gain any or all of these trashed cards. They discard the other revealed cards.
cards.name: Thief

cards.description: Choose an Action card in your hand. Play it twice.
cards.name: Throne Room

cards.description:
+4 Cards; +1 Buy
Each other player draws a card.
cards.name: Council Room

cards.description: +2 Actions, +1 Buy; +$2.
cards.name: Festival

cards.description: +2 Cards; +1 Action.
cards.name: Laboratory

cards.description: Draw until you have 7 cards in hand. You may set aside any Action cards drawn this way, as you draw them; discard the set aside cards after you finish drawing.
cards.name: Library

cards.description: +1 Card; +1 Action; +1 Buy; +$1.
cards.name: Market

cards.description: Trash a Treasure card from your hand. Gain a Treasure card costing up to $3 more; put it into your hand.
cards.name: Mine

cards.description:
+2 Cards
Each other player gains a Curse card.
cards.name: Witch

cards.description: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Treasure cards. Put those Treasure cards in your hand and discard the other revealed cards.
cards.name: Adventurer

cards.description:
+3 Cards
Put a card from your hand on top of your deck.
cards.name: Courtyard

cards.description: Choose two: +1 Card; +1 Action; +1 Buy; +$1.(The choices must be different.)
cards.name: Pawn

cards.description: Discard any number of cards. +$1 per card discarded.When another player plays an Attack card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, +2 cards, then put 2 cards from your hand on top of your deck.
cards.name: Secret Chamber

cards.description: 1 Victory Point+1 Card; +1 Action.
cards.name: Great Hall

cards.description:
+2 Cards
Each player passes a card in their hand to the player on their left. You may trash a card from your hand.
cards.name: Masquerade

cards.description:
+2 Actions
Reveal your hand. If you have no Action cards in hand, +2 Cards.
cards.name: Shanty Town

cards.description: Choose one: +2 Cards; or +$2; or trash 2 cards from your hand.
cards.name: Steward

cards.description:
+$2
Each other player trashes the top card of his deck and gains a card with the same cost that you choose.
cards.name: Swindler

cards.description:
+1 Card; +1 Action
Name a card, then reveal the top card of your deck. If it is the named card, put it in your hand.
cards.name: Wishing Well

cards.description:
+1 Buy
You may discard an Estate card. If you do, +$4. Otherwise, gain an Estate card.
cards.name: Baron

cards.description:
+1 Buy; +$1
All cards (including cards in players’ hands) cost $1 less this turn, but not less than $0.
cards.name: Bridge

cards.description:
+$2
If you’ve played 3 or more Actions this turn (counting this): +1 Card; +1 Action.
cards.name: Conspirator

cards.description: Copper produces an extra $1 this turn.
cards.name: Coppersmith

cards.description: Gain a card costing up to $4. If it is an… Action card, +1 Action. Treasure card, +$1. Victory card, +1 Card.
cards.name: Ironworks

cards.description:
+1 Card; +2 Actions
You may trash this card immediately. If you do, +$2.
cards.name: Mining Village

cards.description:
+1 Action
Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put the revealed Victory cards into your hand. Put the other cards on top of your deck in any order.
cards.name: Scout

cards.description: Worth 1 Victory Point per Duchy you have.
cards.name: Duke

cards.description:
+1 Action
Choose one: +$2; or discard your hand, +4 Cards; and each other player with at least 5 cards in hand discards his hand and draws 4 cards.
cards.name: Minion

cards.description: Each other player reveals cards from the top of his deck until revealing one costing $3 or more. He trashes that card and may gain a card costing at most $2 less than it. He discards the other revealed cards.
cards.name: Saboteur

cards.description:
+3 Cards
Each other player chooses one: he discards 2 cards; or he gains a Curse card, putting it in his hand.
cards.name: Torturer

cards.description: Trash 2 cards from your hand. If you do, gain a silver card; put it into your hand.
cards.name: Trading Post

cards.description: The player to your left reveals then discards the top 2 cards of his deck. For each differently named card revealed, if it is an… Action Card; +2 Actions; Treasure Card; +$2; Victory Card; +2 Cards.
cards.name: Tribute

cards.description:
+1 Card; +1 Action
Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly $1 more than it.
cards.name: Upgrade

cards.description: Worth $22 Victory Points
cards.name: Harem

cards.description:
2 Victory Points
Choose one: +3 Cards; or +2 Actions.
cards.name: Nobles

cards.description:
+$2
Trash this card. Put an Embargo token on top of a Supply pile.When a player buys a card, he gains a Curse card per Embargo token on that pile.
cards.name: Embargo

cards.description:
+1 Card; +1 Action
Set aside a card from your hand face down. At the start of your next turn, put it into your hand.
cards.name: Haven

cards.description:
+1 Action
Now and at the start of your next turn: +$1.While this is in play, when another player plays an Attack card, it doesn’t affect you.
cards.name: Lighthouse

cards.description:
+2 Actions
Choose one: Set aside the top card of your deck face down on your Native Village mat; or put all the cards from your mat into your hand. You may look at the cards on your mat at any time; return them to your deck at the end of the game.
cards.name: Native Village

cards.description:
+1 Card; +1 Action
Look at the bottom card of your deck. You may put it on top.
cards.name: Pearl Diver

cards.description: Reveal a card from your hand. Return up to 2 copies of it from your hand to the Supply. Then each other player gains a copy of it.
cards.name: Ambassador (part II)

cards.description:
+2 Actions, +$1
At the start of your next turn: +1 Action; +$1.
cards.name: Fishing Village

cards.description:
+1 Action
Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Trash one of them. Discard one of them. Put the other one on top of your deck.
cards.name: Lookout

cards.description: Gain a copy of a card costing up to $6 that the player to your right gained on his last turn.
cards.name: Smugglers

cards.description:
+3 Cards; +1 Action
Discard 3 cards.
cards.name: Warehouse

cards.description:
+1 Card; +1 Action
At the start of your next turn, +1 Card.
cards.name: Caravan

cards.description:
+$2
Each other player discards a Copper card (or reveals a hand with no Copper).
cards.name: Cutpurse

cards.description: Set aside this and another card from your hand. Return them to your deck at the end of the game.Worth 2 Victory Points
cards.name: Island

cards.description:
+$2
Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Either discard all of them, or put them back on top of your deck in any order.
cards.name: Navigator

cards.description: Choose one: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes a revealed Treasure that you choose, discards the rest, and if anyone trashed a Treasure you take a Coin token; or, +$1 per Coin token you’ve taken with Pirate Ships this game.
cards.name: Pirate Ship

cards.description:
+1 Buy
Trash a card from your hand. +$ equal to its cost.
cards.name: Salvager

cards.description: Each other player discards the top card of his deck, then gains a Curse card, putting it on top of his deck.
cards.name: Sea Hag

cards.description: Trash this and another copy of Treasure Map from your hand. If you do trash two Treasure Maps, gain 4 Gold cards, putting them on top of your deck.
cards.name: Treasure Map

cards.description: +1 Card; +2 Actions, +$1.
cards.name: Bazaar

cards.description: You may reveal a Province card from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold card, putting it into your hand. Otherwise, gain a Silver card, putting it into your hand.
cards.name: Explorer

cards.description:
+2 Cards
Each other player with 4 or more cards in hand puts cards from his hand on top of his deck until he has 3 cards in his hand.
cards.name: Ghost Ship

cards.description: Now and at the start of your next turn: +$2.
cards.name: Merchant Ship

cards.description: You only draw 3 cards (instead of 5) in this turn’s Clean-up phase. Take an extra turn after this one. This can’t cause you to take more than two consecutive turns.
cards.name: Outpost

cards.description: Discard your hand. If you discarded any cards this way, then at the start of your next turn, +5 Cards; +1 Buy; and +1 Action.
cards.name: Tactician

cards.description:
+1 Card; +1 Action; +$1
When you discard this from play, if you didn’t buy a Victory card this turn, you may put this on top of your deck.
cards.name: Treasury

cards.description: Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Cards; +1 Buy.
cards.name: Wharf

cards.description:
+1 Buy; +$1
When you discard this from play, you may put one of your Treasures from play on top of your deck.
cards.name: Herbalist

cards.description: Worth 1◉.
cards.name: Potion

cards.description:
+1 Action
Trash a card from your hand. +1 Card per Coin it costs. +2 Cards if it has ◉ in its cost.
cards.name: Apprentice

cards.description: Trash a card from your hand. If it is an… Action card, gain a Duchy; Treasure card, gain a Transmute; Victory card, gain a Gold.
cards.name: Transmute

cards.description: Worth 1 Victory Point for every 3 Action cards in your deck (rounded down).
cards.name: Vineyard

cards.description:
+1 Card; +1 Action
Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put the revealed Coppers and Potions into your hand. Put the other cards back on top in any order.
cards.name: Apothecary

cards.description:
+1 Action
Each player (including you) reveals the top card of his deck and either discards it or puts it back, your choice. Then reveal cards from the top of your deck until revealing one that isn’t an Action. Put all of your revealed cards into your hand.
cards.name: Scrying Pool

cards.description:
+2 Actions
You may gain an Action card costing up to $5.
cards.name: University

cards.description:
+2 Cards; +1 Action
When you discard this from play, you may put this on top of your deck if you have a Potion in play.
cards.name: Alchemist

cards.description:
+1 Card; +1 Action
Each other player gains a curse.
cards.name: Familiar

cards.description: When you play this, count your deck and discard pile. Worth $1 per 5 cards total between them (rounded down).
cards.name: Philosopher’s Stone

cards.description: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Action cards other than Golem Cards. Discard the other cards, then play the Action cards in either order.
cards.name: Golem

cards.description: The player to your left takes an extra turn after this one, in which you can see all cards he can and make all decisions for him. Any cards he would gain on that turn, you gain instead; any cards of his that are trashed are set aside and returned to his discard pile at end of turn.
cards.name: Possession

cards.description:
Worth $1
When you play this, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure. Discard it or trash it. Discard the other cards.
cards.name: Loan

cards.description: +1 Buy; +$1 per token on the Trade Route mat.Trash a card from your hand.Setup: Put a token on each Victory card Supply pile. When a card is gained from that pile, move the token to the Trade Route mat.
cards.name: Trade Route

cards.description: Draw until you have 6 cards in hand.When you gain a card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, either trash that card, or put it on top of your deck.
cards.name: Watchtower

cards.description:
+$1; +1 VP token
Trash a card from your hand. +VP tokens equal to half its cost in coins, rounded down. Each other player may trash a card from his hand.
cards.name: Bishop

cards.description: +$2; +1 VP token.
cards.name: Monument

cards.description: Worth $1.While this is in play, Action cards cost $2 less, but not less than $0.
cards.name: Quarry

cards.description: Worth $1.While this is in play, when you buy a card costing $4 or less that is not a Victory card, gain a copy of it.
cards.name: Talisman

cards.description: +1 Card; +2 Actions, +1 Buy
cards.name: Worker’s Village

cards.description:
+1 Card; +2 Actions
If there are one or more empty Supply piles, +1 Card. If there are two or more, +$1 and +1 Buy.
cards.name: City

cards.description:
Worth $3+1 Buy
When you play this, the player to your left names a card. You can’t buy that card this turn.
cards.name: Contraband

cards.description: Look through your discard pile, reveal any number of Copper cards from it, and put them into your hand.
cards.name: Counting House

cards.description: You may reveal a Treasure card from your hand. Gain a copy of it.When you buy this, trash all Treasures you have in play.
cards.name: Mint

cards.description:
+$2
Each other player may discard a Curse. If he doesn’t, he gains a Curse and a Copper.
cards.name: Mountebank

cards.description:
+3 Cards
Each other player reveals the top 3 cards of his deck, discards the revealed Actions and Treasures, and puts the rest back on top in any order he chooses.
cards.name: Rabble

cards.description:
Worth $2
While this is in play, when you gain a card, you may put that card on top of your deck.
cards.name: Royal Seal

cards.description:
+2 Cards
Discard any number of cards. +$1 per card discarded. Each other player may discard 2 cards. If he does, he draws a card.
cards.name: Vault

cards.description:
Worth $1
When you play this, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure. Discard the other cards. Play that Treasure.
cards.name: Venture

cards.description:
+1 Buy; +$2
Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.While this is in play, when you buy a card, +1 VP token.
cards.name: Goons

cards.description:
+1 Card; +1 Action; +1 Buy; +$2
You can’t buy this if you have any Copper in play.
cards.name: Grand Market

cards.description: Worth $2.While this is in play, when you buy a Victory card, gain a Gold.
cards.name: Hoard

cards.description: Worth $?When you play this, it’s worth $1 per Treasure card you have in play (counting this).
cards.name: Bank

cards.description: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to $3 more than the trashed card.
cards.name: Expand

cards.description: Trash any number of cards from your hand. Gain a card with cost exactly equal to the total cost in coins of the trashed cards.
cards.name: Forge

cards.description: You may choose an Action card in your hand. Play it three times.
cards.name: King’s Court

cards.description:
+1 Card; +1 Action; +$1
During your Buy phase, this costs $2 less per Action card you have in play, but not less than $0.
cards.name: Peddler

cards.description: Worth $5
cards.name: Platinum

cards.description: 10 Victory Points
cards.name: Colony

cards.description:
+2 Actions
Return this to the Madman pile. If you do, +1 Card per card in your hand.(This is not in the Supply.)
cards.name: Madman

cards.description: You may trash 2 cards from your hand. If you do, +2 Cards, + $2, and each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.(This is not in the Supply.)
cards.name: Mercenary

cards.description:
$3
When you play this, return it to the pile.
cards.name: Spoils

cards.description:
+$4
Reveal your hand. -$1 per Treasure card in your hand, to a minimum of $0.
cards.name: Poor House

cards.description: Gain 3 Coppers, putting them into your hand.___When another player plays an Attack card, you may discard this. If you do, gain two Silvers, putting one on top of your deck.
cards.name: Beggar

cards.description:
+$1
Choose one: +2 Actions; or +2 Buys; or gain a Silver.___When you trash this, gain an Attack card.
cards.name: Squire

cards.description:
+1 Card; +1 Action
Reveal the top card of your deck. If it’s a Victory card, Curse, Ruins, or Shelter, put it into your hand.
cards.name: Vagrant

cards.description:
+1 Action; +1 Buy
Trash a card from your hand. +$1 per differently named Treasure in the trash.
cards.name: Forager

cards.description: Look through your discard pile. You may trash a card that is not a Treasure, from your discard pile or your hand. Gain a card costing up to $3.___When you discard this from play, if you didn’t buy any cards this turn, trash this and gain a Madman (from the Madman pile).
cards.name: Hermit

cards.description: +1 Card; +1 Action; +1 Buy___When one of your cards is trashed, you may discard this from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold.
cards.name: Market Square

cards.description:
+1 Action
Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal one costing $3 or more. Put that card into your hand and discard the rest.
cards.name: Sage

cards.description:
+1 Buy
Discard any number of cards. +1 Card per card discarded. Discard any number of cards. +$1 per card discarded the second time.
cards.name: Storeroom

cards.description:
+1 Card; +1 Action
Each other player discards down to 4 cards in hand.___When you play another Attack card with this in play, you may trash this. If you do, gain a Mercenary from the Mercenary pile.
cards.name: Urchin

cards.description: Gain a card costing up to $4. Put it on top of your deck.
cards.name: Armory

cards.description:
+$5
You may trash an Action card from your hand. If you don’t, trash this.___When you gain this, gain two Ruins.
cards.name: Death Cart

cards.description: Worth 1 VP for every 3 Silvers in your deck.___When you trash this, gain 3 Silvers.
cards.name: Feodum

cards.description: +1 Card; +2 Actions___When you trash this, put it into your hand.
cards.name: Fortress

cards.description:
+1 Card; +1 Action
Reveal the top card of your deck; you may discard it. If it is an Action card, +1 Action; a Treasure card, +$1; a Victory card, +1 Card.
cards.name: Ironmonger

cards.description: Gain a Spoils from the Spoils pile. Each other player gains a Ruins.
cards.name: Marauder

cards.description: You may play an Action card from your hand twice. Trash it. Gain an Action card costing exactly $1 more than it.
cards.name: Procession

cards.description:
+1 Card; +1 Action
Gain a Rats. Trash a card from your hand other than a Rats (or reveal a hand of all Rats).___When this is trashed, +1 Card.
cards.name: Rats

cards.description:
+$2
You may put your deck into your discard pile. Look through your discard pile and put one card from it on top of your deck.
cards.name: Scavenger

cards.description:
+1 Card; +2 Actions
Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put the Actions back on top in any order and discard the rest.
cards.name: Wandering Minstrel

cards.description: Play this as if it were an Action card in the Supply costing less than it that you choose. This is that card until it leaves play.
cards.name: Band of Misfits

cards.description:
+1 Card; +2 Actions
Gain a Spoils from the Spoils pile.
cards.name: Bandit Camp

cards.description: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Choose one: Put them into your hand; or discard them and +3 Cards.___When you trash this, gain a cheaper card.
cards.name: Catacombs

cards.description: Choose one: Discard 2 cards; put a card from your hand on top of your deck; or gain a Copper.Choose one: +$3; trash your hand; or gain a Duchy.
cards.name: Count

cards.description:
$1; +1 Buy
When you play this, you may play a treasure from your hand twice. If you do, trash that treasure.
cards.name: Counterfeit

cards.description:
+2 Cards
Each other player gains a Ruins. You may play a Cultist from your hand.___When you trash this, +3 Cards.
cards.name: Cultist

cards.description: Choose one: Gain a card from the trash costing from $3 to $6, putting it on top of your deck; or trash an Action card from your hand and gain a card costing up to $3 more than it.
cards.name: Graverobber

cards.description:
+1 Card; +1 Action; +$1
Trash a card from your hand.
cards.name: Junk Dealer

cards.description:
+1 Action+$2
Name a card. Reveal the top card of your deck. If it’s the named card, put it into your hand.
cards.name: Mystic

cards.description: Trash this. Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand reveals his hand and discards a card that you choose. Gain 2 Spoils.
cards.name: Pillage

cards.description:
+1 Action
Name a card. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a Victory card that is not the named card. Discard the other cards. Trash the Victory card and gain a Victory card costing up to $3 more than it.
cards.name: Rebuild

cards.description:
+$2
If there are any cards in the trash costing from $3 to $6, gain one of them. Otherwise, each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest.
cards.name: Rogue

cards.description: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to $5.
cards.name: Altar

cards.description: +4 Cards___When this is trashed, gain a Duchy or 3 Estates
cards.name: Hunting Grounds

cards.description: +1 Card
cards.name: Ruined Library

cards.description: +1 Buy
cards.name: Ruined Market

cards.description: +1 Action
cards.name: Ruined Village

cards.description: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Discard them or put them back in any order.
cards.name: Survivors

cards.description: You may trash up to 2 cards from your hand.Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.
cards.name: Dame Anna

cards.description: Worth 2 VP.Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.
cards.name: Dame Josephine

cards.description: +2 Actions.Each other player discards the top 2 cards of his deck, and trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.
cards.name: Dame Molly

cards.description: You may gain a card costing up to $3.Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.
cards.name: Dame Natalie

cards.description:
+$2
Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.
cards.name: Dame Sylvia

cards.description:
+1 Card; +1 Action
Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.
cards.name: Sir Bailey

cards.description:
+2 Cards
Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.
cards.name: Sir Destry

cards.description:
+2 Buys
Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.
cards.name: Sir Martin

cards.description: Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.
cards.name: Sir Michael

cards.description: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.___When this is trashed, gain a Gold.
cards.name: Sir Vander

cards.description: When you buy a Victory card, you may trash this from your hand.
cards.name: Hovel

cards.description: +2 Actions
cards.name: Necropolis

cards.description: 0 VP___When you trash this, +1 Card.
cards.name: Overgrown Estate
